author: Anonymous Poet
title: Problem2
question:
DOes this also work?
;;given p and lox produce (list (p x0) (p x1)...)
instructor_answer:
This purpose implies that filter2 keeps all the elements in the list, and predicate transforms them somehow. So it would be incorrect, as the elements might get removed from the list depending on if they match the given predicate.
This is a great purpose for the map abstract function though!
